description: Indian Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-In) has issued a warning to Google Chrome users. The advisory was issued on Wednesday after the government agency discovered many security flaws in the Windows, Mac, and Linux version of Google Chrome. These vulnerabilities, if exploited, could allow allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code. CERT-In has issued a ‘High’ severity warning for this vulnerability.
title: CERT-In Urges Google Chrome Users to Update After Google Patches Critical Security Flaws

description: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025 running through the Diwali period, offers shoppers attractive discounts on electronics, including PCs, laptops, tablets, smartwatches, and home appliances. Customers can boost savings using select bank cards from Axis Bank, Bobcard, IDFC First Bank, and RBL Bank for an additional 10 percent instant discount, with benefits up to Rs. 65,000. Exchange deals, EMI options, and coupons are also available until October 12. Gaming monitors are a key highlight, alongside other gaming gear like entry-level laptops and headsets.
title: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025: Best Deals on Gaming Monitors From Dell, LG, Lenovo, Samsung and More

description: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025 is available to customers in India. The ongoing sale is the best time to upgrade your phone as many flagship smartphones are listed with compelling discounts. Apple's iPhone 15 is currently offered for Rs. 57,499, down from its listed price of Rs. 79,900. There are additional payment based discounts. Shoppers can also avail exchange deals, no-cost EMI options, and Amazon Pay offers.
title: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025: Top Discounts on Smartphones Under Rs. 60,000 During the Sale

description: Google may soon allow Android users to share earthquake alerts with others, including iOS contacts, through messaging apps or social media, with notifications expected to carry the hashtag #AndroidEarthquakeAlerts. An APK teardown also hints at a new Tools icon on the Gemini overlay, providing quick access to features like Veo video tools and image generation. While based on unfinished code and not guaranteed in public releases, these teardowns reveal potential upcoming enhancements to Android’s earthquake alerts and user tools.
title: Google Reportedly Working on Ability to Share Android Earthquake Alerts With iPhone Users

description: Google India has shared five ways in which users can create their Diwali-themed images using Gemini AI’s Nano Banana. They can either head over to the Gemini mobile or web app to use the feature. The company has also shared pre-written prompts that people can directly enter into the AI chatbot. Gemini will present downloadable images once users have followed the instructions.
title: How to Use Google’s Gemini AI to Turn Your Photos Into  Diwali-Themed Images Using Nano Banana

description: WhatsApp has reportedly started rolling out a new feature for beta testers, dubbed Status Questions. With this, users will be able to add a new question sticker to their status updates, along with photos, videos, and text. Their contacts will be able to submit their responses by typing the answer directly into the question box. The responses could be end-to-end encrypted to ensure privacy and security.
title: WhatsApp May Soon Let You Add Instagram-Inspired 'Questions' to Your Status

description: Dubai’s Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority (VARA) has fined 19 digital asset firms for operating without licences and breaching marketing regulations. Fines ranged from AED 100,000 to AED 600,000, with cease-and-desist orders issued. The action comes amid broader VARA policy upgrades, including enhanced risk oversight, client verification, and compliance standards for licensed crypto and Web3 service providers, reinforcing a secure and fully regulated digital asset market in Dubai.
title: Dubai’s VARA Fines 19 Crypto Firms for Unlicensed Operations

description: NPCI and RBI announced biometric and wearable glass-based authentication for UPI in India. Users can now verify payments via fingerprint or face unlock instead of a PIN, with Aadhaar-linked data and an initial Rs. 5,000 limit. The system aims to enhance convenience and security, especially for seniors. However, experts caution against accidental payments. Biometric use requires user consent, periodic security updates, and reactivation if unused for 90 days. Here we tell you how to use it.
title: How to Use Biometric Authentication for UPI Payments in India: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: Motorola announced the rollout of Android 16 in India on Wednesday. The latest software is first arriving on select Motorola Edge 60 series smartphones. The Android 16 introduces a wide range of design, security and connectivity enhancements to the Motorola smartphone. The update include a Notification Auto Grouping feature and Instant Hotspot feature. It offers improved compatibility with LE Audio devices.
title: Motorola Announces Android 16 Update Rollout in India; Edge Series Models to Receive Update First

description: Realme has finally taken the wraps off the Realme 15 Pro 5G Game of Thrones Limited Edition. It has been introduced in India and the global markets as a limited edition variant of the Realme 15 Pro 5G. The handset boasts cosmetic changes inspired by HBO’s Game of Thrones show, such as stylised nano-engraved motifs and custom user interface (UI) themes.
title: Realme 15 Pro 5G Game of Thrones Limited Edition Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: How to Train Your Dragon is all set to land on your digital screens. The movie explores themes of friendship, emotions, perception, and more.
title: How To Train Your Dragon OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Jio has unveiled its latest series of JioBharat Phones, which now come with multiple safety features. The company said that the handsets will be most useful for the caretakers of the elderly, parents of children, and women, as they ship with location monitoring capabilities, usage manager, and up to seven-day battery backup. Additionally, the company unveiled its new Jio AI Classroom course.
title: IMC 2025: JioBharat Phones With Safety Features, Jio AI Classroom Programme Announced

description: Vi has introduced Vi Protect, an AI-driven initiative focused on ensuring safety and security measures against the spams and cyber threats. As part of this initiative, Vi introduced two measures at India Mobile Congress (IMC) 2025. An AI-based Voice Spam Detection System and Cyber Defense and Incident Response System. The former detects and flags fraudulent and spam calls in real time.
title: IMC 2025: Vodafone Idea Launches Vi Protect to Tackle Fraud Calls, SMS, and Cyber Threats Using AI

description: JBL has launched the Tour One M3 and Tour One M3 Smart Tx headphones in India, priced at Rs. 34,999 and Rs. 39,999, respectively. Featuring Hi-Res Bluetooth, lossless audio, and True Adaptive Noise Cancelling 2.0, they are claimed to offer up to 70 hours of playback. The Smart Tx includes an Auracast transmitter and touch display for wireless connectivity. Equipped with 40mm Mica drivers, Spatial Sound with head tracking, and Personi-Fi 3.0, the headphones are said to offer immersive audio and clear call experiences.
title: JBL Tour One M3 Smart Tx Launched in India With Auracast Support, Adaptive ANC: Price, Specifications

description: Written and directed by M. Muthaiya, Rambo is an upcoming Tamil sports action drama movie that is set to land on your digital screens soon. The movie stars Arulnithi and Tanya S Ravichandran in the prominent roles.
title: Rambo OTT Release Date Revealed: Know When to Watch This Tamil Action Drama Movie Online

description: Realme will soon announce the “world-renowned” camera brand that it is working with for its upcoming flagship Realme GT 8 series. One of the company executives said that the collaboration will “subvert your imagination” (translated from Chinese). The Chinese brand recently revealed that its upcoming Realme GT 8 Pro will feature a detachable rear camera module. This will enable users to swap and choose from at least three distinct camera islands.
title: Realme to Announce Camera Tuning Collaboration for Realme GT 8 Pro Series on October 9

description: The Death of Bunny Munro is an upcoming drama series that follows an addicted salesman, exploring the path of self-discovery with his grieving son.
title: The Death of Bunny Munro OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Bitcoin and Ethereum cooled slightly on Wednesday after hitting fresh highs earlier this week, with BTC trading near $121,000 and ETH around $4,400. Analysts say the pullback reflects healthy consolidation as institutional inflows and macroeconomic cues continue to support momentum. Altcoins also saw mixed moves, with Binance Coin and Solana holding steady while PancakeSwap led the gainers. Experts note that Bitcoin’s $120,000 support remains crucial, while Ethereum’s strength above $4,500 could fuel the next rally.
title: Bitcoin Tests $121,000 Support, Ethereum Steadies Despite Market Cool-Off

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra specifications and features have been surfacing online for a while now. While the company has yet to confirm the launch of the handset, it is widely believed to debut early next year. Recently, the CAD renders of the phone leaked, revealing its design. Now, a tipster has shared the key specifications of the Galaxy S26 Ultra, suggesting the improvements it might offer over its predecessor.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Key Specifications, Design and Colourways Leaked

description: Anthropic's new office will be located in Bengaluru, widely recognized as the technology hub of India, and operations will start early 2026, the company said. The location would serve as its second office in the Asia Pacific region after Tokyo.
title: Anthropic to Open First India Office in Bengaluru in 2026 as Demand for AI Tools Grows

description: Apple has quietly fixed a glitch affecting Apple Intelligence on iPhone 17 and iPhone Air models. The bug had prevented some users from accessing AI features like Genmoji, Image Playground, and Writing Tools. Reports indicate the problem first appeared shortly after the devices launched on September 9. Affected users said Apple’s support team was aware, and the server-side update was applied automatically. iPhone users can check Apple Intelligence status in Settings.
title: Apple Reportedly Fixes Apple Intelligence Bug Affecting iPhone 17 Series, iPhone Air

description: Google is bringing Search Live in AI Mode to India, the company announced on Wednesday. It makes India the first country outside the US to receive the feature. Search Live in AI Mode, notably, is a two-way conversational feature which allows users to hold voice conversations with the AI chatbot. Alongside, Google also announced the expansion of AI Mode to seven new Indian languages.
title: Google Brings Search Live in AI Mode to India, Rolls Out Support for Seven New Indian Languages

description: Google is reportedly testing a new Chrome feature for Android that automatically requests the desktop version of websites when the browser is used in the Desktop Mode. This lets users to access the full desktop-style layouts by default. In the new version, Google Chrome reportedly shows its full tab strip at the top. It is reportedly working by changing the browser’s user agent when connected to an external display.
title: Google Chrome Updated With Improved Support for Android’s New Desktop Mode: Report

description: Lava Shark 2 is expected to be launched in India soon. Ahead of its launch, the colourways of the Lava Shark 5G successor have been revealed. It will be available for purchase in two shades --- black and silver. As per the company, the handset will have a glossy back design, featuring a camera deco that closely resembles the Lava Bold N1 Pro 5G. We can expect more details to be revealed closer to the launch of the Lava Shark 2.
title: Lava Shark 2 Colour Options, Rear Panel With Glossy Finish Revealed Ahead of Launch in India

description: NPCI and RBI unveiled several initiatives to advance India’s digital payments ecosystem on Tuesday. NPCI launched on-device biometric authentication for UPI, allowing fingerprint or face unlock for transactions up to Rs. 5,000, and Aadhaar-based face authentication for setting or resetting UPI PINs. UPI Lite now supports payments via wearable smart glasses. New cash withdrawal modes through micro ATMs and multi-signatory account access were also introduced. Navi UPI became India’s first platform to offer biometric-based payments at scale.
title: NPCI Enhances UPI Payments with Biometric, Wearable Glass Verification

description: OnePlus Nord 6 launch in India could be on the cards as the phone has cleared its first hurdle ahead of the official launch in India. It has now been listed on the IMEI database with model number CPH2807, according to a report. The OnePlus Nord 6 is expected to arrive as a rebranded version of the China exclusive OnePlus Ace 6. It is likely to offer upgrades over the OnePlus Nord 5.
title: OnePlus Nord 6 Reportedly Listed on IMEI Website Hinting at Upcoming OnePlus Nord 5 Successor

description: OpenAI has banned several accounts, potentially linked to China, that attempted to use ChatGPT for mass surveillance, social media monitoring, and profiling. Some accounts also sought assistance in developing tools targeting Uyghurs and other sensitive topics. OpenAI confirmed no such tools were actually built, and accounts from Russia attempting phishing-related uses were also blocked.
title: OpenAI Bans ChatGPT Accounts Linked to China-Backed Surveillance Efforts

description: Sony and Konami are reportedly bringing the Silent Hill 2 remake to PS Plus Game Catalog this month, mere weeks after the launch of Silent Hill f. The survival horror game will likely mark the Halloween month for PS Plus additions. The game will reportedly join PS Plus on October 21.
title: Silent Hill 2 Remake is Reportedly Coming to PS Plus Game Catalog in October

description: Vivo X300, the standard model, camera performance has been teased via a video on Weibo by a company executive. In the caption of the video, he has revealed details about the main sensor on the back. Moreover, Vivo, in a social media post, has announced that the upcoming Vivo X300 series will feature a Sony LYT828 sensor.
title: Vivo X300 Series to Feature Sony LYT828 Sensor, Custom HPB Lens: See Expected Camera Specifications

description: Following the recent announcement of the One UI 8 release schedule for Galaxy devices in India, the company has begun rolling out the Android 16-based firmware update. According to claims on social media, the Samsung Galaxy F36 has become the latest handset from the South Korean tech conglomerate to receive an update. Samsung users report that the update is now also available for its identical sibling, the Galaxy M36.
title: Samsung Galaxy F36, Galaxy M36 Said to Be Receiving Android 16-Based One UI 8 Update in India

description: The Honor Magic 8 series is scheduled to be launched in China on October 16. Ahead of its debut, the white colourway of the Pro model in the lineup has allegedly surfaced via images on social media. The Honor Magic 8 Pro appears to share its design with the standard variant, featuring a large circular camera deco at the back. The camera system on the upcoming handset is also confirmed to use AI for image enhancements.
title: Honor Magic 8 Pro Allegedly Leaked in White Colourway Ahead of Launch in China

description: The Realme 15 Pro Game of Thrones Edition is set to be launched in India today, as a limited edition variant of the Realme 15 Pro 5G. The handset is teased to sport custom design and UI themes inspired by HBO's Game of Thrones show. From expected price in India to specifications, here is all you need to know about the Realme 15 Pro Game of Thrones Edition ahead of its launch in India today.
title: Realme 15 Pro Game of Thrones Edition Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features and Specifications
